Name: CULT
About the game: Chosen to be sacrificed. A kidnapped girl must use her wits and strength to escape a cult of demon worshipers. Cult is a turned based escape game that will test you at every corner. You will need to find items, play ability cards and fight for your life. Do you have the courage to escape?
